segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar, standing on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he’s about to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to everything going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel happy for the kids because they’re getting away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so careless, and the woman is too distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic, but it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like no one cares about the mess or the danger, and that’s kind of amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
